issue.title: [Rust] CI scripts miss --all-targets cargo argument
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5823](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5823). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Rust build breaks because some changes in array builder. However this error is not detected in ci scripts because missing --all-targets in cargo build command.
